name: Neo Nasty
description:
NEO NASTY game is a puzzle with a timer, where you need to collect photos. If you have not completed the puzzle in time specified in the timer, the game will offer you to assemble it again, and if you have completed the puzzle, the game will offer to assemble new one. So this way the game creates the photo session effect. The collected photos can be opened in the gallery, where you can review them and put them in a new puzzle.

We reserve the right to offer all users of Android devices interested in the NEO NASTY games elongation to make a voluntary contribution by specifying the price while placing the order for the game download in our store. The funds collected from our store activity will be used for organization the photo sessions to create new games.
